tool_description: Estimates appropriate meeting duration based on meeting type, number of participants, and agenda complexity.

meeting_type.description: Type of meeting: standup, planning, review, brainstorming, presentation, interview, or custom

agenda_items.description: List of agenda items or topics to discuss

complexity_level.description: Meeting complexity: low, medium, or high

error_messages: Invalid meeting type: Use one of [standup, planning, review, brainstorming, presentation, interview, custom].
Invalid participant count: Must be between 1 and 100 participants.
Invalid complexity level: Use one of [low, medium, high].
Agenda items too many: Maximum 20 agenda items allowed for duration estimation.
usage: Provide meeting_type and participant_count. Optionally include agenda_items and complexity_level. Returns estimated duration with range and reasoning.

estimation_reasoning.description: Explanation of how the duration was calculated

time_allocation_suggestions.description: Suggested time allocation for different meeting segments
